\section{Production Deployment Options}
\label{\detokenize{deployment:production-deployment-options}}

\subsection{Option 1: Screen/Tmux (Simple)}
\label{\detokenize{deployment:option-1-screen-tmux-simple}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
For quick deployment on a server:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Using screen}
screen\PYG{+w}{ }\PYGZhy{}S\PYG{+w}{ }trading\PYGZus{}bot
workon\PYG{+w}{ }woox
python\PYG{+w}{ }trade.py
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Detach: Ctrl+A, D}

\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Reattach later}
screen\PYG{+w}{ }\PYGZhy{}r\PYG{+w}{ }trading\PYGZus{}bot
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Using tmux}
tmux\PYG{+w}{ }new\PYG{+w}{ }\PYGZhy{}s\PYG{+w}{ }trading\PYGZus{}bot
workon\PYG{+w}{ }woox
python\PYG{+w}{ }trade.py
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Detach: Ctrl+B, D}

\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Reattach later}
tmux\PYG{+w}{ }attach\PYG{+w}{ }\PYGZhy{}t\PYG{+w}{ }trading\PYGZus{}bot
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Pros}: Simple, quick setup
\sphinxstylestrong{Cons}: Doesn‚Äôt auto\sphinxhyphen{}restart on failure


\subsection{Option 2: Systemd Service (Recommended)}
\label{\detokenize{deployment:option-2-systemd-service-recommended}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
Create systemd service for auto\sphinxhyphen{}restart:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Create service file}
sudo\PYG{+w}{ }vim\PYG{+w}{ }/etc/systemd/system/woox\PYGZhy{}trading.service
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\sphinxAtStartPar
Service configuration:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{k}{[Unit]}
\PYG{n+na}{Description}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s}{WOOX Trading Bot}
\PYG{n+na}{After}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s}{network.target}

\PYG{k}{[Service]}
\PYG{n+na}{Type}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s}{simple}
\PYG{n+na}{User}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s}{youruser}
\PYG{n+na}{WorkingDirectory}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s}{/Users/honcy/myproj/woox}
\PYG{n+na}{Environment}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s}{WOOX\PYGZus{}API\PYGZus{}KEY=your\PYGZus{}key}\PYG{l+s}{\PYGZdq{}}
\PYG{n+na}{Environment}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s}{WOOX\PYGZus{}API\PYGZus{}SECRET=your\PYGZus{}secret}\PYG{l+s}{\PYGZdq{}}
\PYG{n+na}{Environment}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s}{PATH=/Users/honcy/.virtualenvs/woox/bin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/bin:/bin}\PYG{l+s}{\PYGZdq{}}
\PYG{n+na}{ExecStart}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s}{/Users/honcy/.virtualenvs/woox/bin/python trade.py}
\PYG{n+na}{Restart}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s}{always}
\PYG{n+na}{RestartSec}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s}{10}
\PYG{n+na}{StandardOutput}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s}{append:/var/log/woox\PYGZhy{}trading/output.log}
\PYG{n+na}{StandardError}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s}{append:/var/log/woox\PYGZhy{}trading/error.log}

\PYG{k}{[Install]}
\PYG{n+na}{WantedBy}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s}{multi\PYGZhy{}user.target}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\sphinxAtStartPar
Enable and start service:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Create log directory}
sudo\PYG{+w}{ }mkdir\PYG{+w}{ }\PYGZhy{}p\PYG{+w}{ }/var/log/woox\PYGZhy{}trading
sudo\PYG{+w}{ }chown\PYG{+w}{ }youruser:youruser\PYG{+w}{ }/var/log/woox\PYGZhy{}trading

\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Enable service}
sudo\PYG{+w}{ }systemctl\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{n+nb}{enable}\PYG{+w}{ }woox\PYGZhy{}trading

\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Start service}
sudo\PYG{+w}{ }systemctl\PYG{+w}{ }start\PYG{+w}{ }woox\PYGZhy{}trading

\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Check status}
sudo\PYG{+w}{ }systemctl\PYG{+w}{ }status\PYG{+w}{ }woox\PYGZhy{}trading

\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} View logs}
sudo\PYG{+w}{ }journalctl\PYG{+w}{ }\PYGZhy{}u\PYG{+w}{ }woox\PYGZhy{}trading\PYG{+w}{ }\PYGZhy{}f
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Pros}: Auto\sphinxhyphen{}restart, system integration, log management
\sphinxstylestrong{Cons}: Requires root access


\subsection{Option 3: Supervisor (Alternative)}
\label{\detokenize{deployment:option-3-supervisor-alternative}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
Install supervisor:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
pip\PYG{+w}{ }install\PYG{+w}{ }supervisor
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\sphinxAtStartPar
Create config:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} /etc/supervisor/conf.d/woox\PYGZhy{}trading.conf}
\PYG{k}{[program:woox\PYGZhy{}trading]}
\PYG{n+na}{command}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s}{/Users/honcy/.virtualenvs/woox/bin/python trade.py}
\PYG{n+na}{directory}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s}{/Users/honcy/myproj/woox}
\PYG{n+na}{user}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s}{youruser}
\PYG{n+na}{autostart}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s}{true}
\PYG{n+na}{autorestart}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s}{true}
\PYG{n+na}{stderr\PYGZus{}logfile}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s}{/var/log/woox\PYGZhy{}trading/error.log}
\PYG{n+na}{stdout\PYGZus{}logfile}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s}{/var/log/woox\PYGZhy{}trading/output.log}
\PYG{n+na}{environment=WOOX\PYGZus{}API\PYGZus{}KEY}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s}{your\PYGZus{}key}\PYG{l+s}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{n+na}{,WOOX\PYGZus{}API\PYGZus{}SECRET}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s}{your\PYGZus{}secret}\PYG{l+s}{\PYGZdq{}}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\sphinxAtStartPar
Start supervisor:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
supervisorctl\PYG{+w}{ }reread
supervisorctl\PYG{+w}{ }update
supervisorctl\PYG{+w}{ }start\PYG{+w}{ }woox\PYGZhy{}trading
\end{sphinxVerbatim}


\subsection{Option 4: Docker (Advanced)}
\label{\detokenize{deployment:option-4-docker-advanced}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
Create Dockerfile:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{k}{FROM}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{l+s}{python:3.12\PYGZhy{}slim}

\PYG{k}{WORKDIR}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{l+s}{/app}

\PYG{k}{COPY}\PYG{+w}{ }requirements.txt\PYG{+w}{ }.
\PYG{k}{RUN}\PYG{+w}{ }pip\PYG{+w}{ }install\PYG{+w}{ }\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}no\PYGZhy{}cache\PYGZhy{}dir\PYG{+w}{ }\PYGZhy{}r\PYG{+w}{ }requirements.txt

\PYG{k}{COPY}\PYG{+w}{ }.\PYG{+w}{ }.

\PYG{k}{ENV}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{n+nv}{WOOX\PYGZus{}API\PYGZus{}KEY}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}\PYGZdq{}}
\PYG{k}{ENV}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{n+nv}{WOOX\PYGZus{}API\PYGZus{}SECRET}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}\PYGZdq{}}

\PYG{k}{CMD}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{p}{[}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}python\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{,}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}trade.py\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{]}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\sphinxAtStartPar
Build and run:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Build image}
docker\PYG{+w}{ }build\PYG{+w}{ }\PYGZhy{}t\PYG{+w}{ }woox\PYGZhy{}trading\PYGZhy{}bot\PYG{+w}{ }.

\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Run container}
docker\PYG{+w}{ }run\PYG{+w}{ }\PYGZhy{}d\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{l+s+se}{\PYGZbs{}}
\PYG{+w}{  }\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}name\PYG{+w}{ }trading\PYGZhy{}bot\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{l+s+se}{\PYGZbs{}}
\PYG{+w}{  }\PYGZhy{}\PYGZhy{}restart\PYG{+w}{ }unless\PYGZhy{}stopped\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{l+s+se}{\PYGZbs{}}
\PYG{+w}{  }\PYGZhy{}e\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{n+nv}{WOOX\PYGZus{}API\PYGZus{}KEY}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}your\PYGZus{}key\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{l+s+se}{\PYGZbs{}}
\PYG{+w}{  }\PYGZhy{}e\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{n+nv}{WOOX\PYGZus{}API\PYGZus{}SECRET}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}your\PYGZus{}secret\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{l+s+se}{\PYGZbs{}}
\PYG{+w}{  }\PYGZhy{}v\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{k}{\PYGZdl{}(}\PYG{n+nb}{pwd}\PYG{k}{)}/live\PYGZus{}transaction.db:/app/live\PYGZus{}transaction.db\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{l+s+se}{\PYGZbs{}}
\PYG{+w}{  }\PYGZhy{}v\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{k}{\PYGZdl{}(}\PYG{n+nb}{pwd}\PYG{k}{)}/.config:/app/.config\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{l+s+se}{\PYGZbs{}}
\PYG{+w}{  }\PYGZhy{}v\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{k}{\PYGZdl{}(}\PYG{n+nb}{pwd}\PYG{k}{)}/trade.log:/app/trade.log\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{l+s+se}{\PYGZbs{}}
\PYG{+w}{  }woox\PYGZhy{}trading\PYGZhy{}bot

\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} View logs}
docker\PYG{+w}{ }logs\PYG{+w}{ }\PYGZhy{}f\PYG{+w}{ }trading\PYGZhy{}bot
\end{sphinxVerbatim}


\section{Monitoring and Alerting}
\label{\detokenize{deployment:monitoring-and-alerting}}

\subsection{Log Monitoring}
\label{\detokenize{deployment:log-monitoring}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
Set up log rotation:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} /etc/logrotate.d/woox\PYGZhy{}trading}
/var/log/woox\PYGZhy{}trading/*.log\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{o}{\PYGZob{}}
\PYG{+w}{    }daily
\PYG{+w}{    }rotate\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{l+m}{30}
\PYG{+w}{    }compress
\PYG{+w}{    }delaycompress
\PYG{+w}{    }notifempty
\PYG{+w}{    }create\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{l+m}{0644}\PYG{+w}{ }youruser\PYG{+w}{ }youruser
\PYG{+w}{    }sharedscripts
\PYG{+w}{    }postrotate
\PYG{+w}{        }systemctl\PYG{+w}{ }reload\PYG{+w}{ }woox\PYGZhy{}trading\PYG{+w}{ }\PYGZgt{}\PYG{+w}{ }/dev/null\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{l+m}{2}\PYGZgt{}\PYG{p}{\PYGZam{}}\PYG{l+m}{1}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{o}{||}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{n+nb}{true}
\PYG{+w}{    }endscript
\PYG{o}{\PYGZcb{}}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\sphinxAtStartPar
Monitor for errors:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Watch for errors in real\PYGZhy{}time}
tail\PYG{+w}{ }\PYGZhy{}f\PYG{+w}{ }trade.log\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{p}{|}\PYG{+w}{ }grep\PYG{+w}{ }ERROR

\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Get error summary}
grep\PYG{+w}{ }ERROR\PYG{+w}{ }trade.log\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{p}{|}\PYG{+w}{ }tail\PYG{+w}{ }\PYGZhy{}20
\end{sphinxVerbatim}


\subsection{Email Alerts (Simple)}
\label{\detokenize{deployment:email-alerts-simple}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
Add to trade.py for critical alerts:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{k+kn}{import}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{n+nn}{smtplib}
\PYG{k+kn}{from}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{n+nn}{email}\PYG{n+nn}{.}\PYG{n+nn}{message}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{k+kn}{import} \PYG{n}{EmailMessage}

\PYG{k}{def}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{n+nf}{send\PYGZus{}alert}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n}{subject}\PYG{p}{,} \PYG{n}{body}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{:}
\PYG{+w}{    }\PYG{l+s+sd}{\PYGZdq{}\PYGZdq{}\PYGZdq{}Send email alert for critical issues.\PYGZdq{}\PYGZdq{}\PYGZdq{}}
    \PYG{n}{msg} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{n}{EmailMessage}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{p}{)}
    \PYG{n}{msg}\PYG{p}{[}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{l+s+s1}{Subject}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{n}{subject}
    \PYG{n}{msg}\PYG{p}{[}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{l+s+s1}{From}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{l+s+s1}{trading\PYGZhy{}bot@yourdomain.com}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}
    \PYG{n}{msg}\PYG{p}{[}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{l+s+s1}{To}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{p}{]} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{l+s+s1}{your\PYGZhy{}email@example.com}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}
    \PYG{n}{msg}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{set\PYGZus{}content}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n}{body}\PYG{p}{)}

    \PYG{k}{with} \PYG{n}{smtplib}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{SMTP}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{l+s+s1}{smtp.gmail.com}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{p}{,} \PYG{l+m+mi}{587}\PYG{p}{)} \PYG{k}{as} \PYG{n}{server}\PYG{p}{:}
        \PYG{n}{server}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{starttls}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{p}{)}
        \PYG{n}{server}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{login}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{l+s+s1}{your\PYGZhy{}email@gmail.com}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{p}{,} \PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{l+s+s1}{app\PYGZhy{}password}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{p}{)}
        \PYG{n}{server}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{send\PYGZus{}message}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n}{msg}\PYG{p}{)}

\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Use in error handling}
\PYG{k}{try}\PYG{p}{:}
    \PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Trading logic}
    \PYG{k}{pass}
\PYG{k}{except} \PYG{n+ne}{Exception} \PYG{k}{as} \PYG{n}{e}\PYG{p}{:}
    \PYG{n}{send\PYGZus{}alert}\PYG{p}{(}
        \PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{l+s+s1}{Trading Bot Error}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{p}{,}
        \PYG{l+s+sa}{f}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{l+s+s1}{Critical error occurred: }\PYG{l+s+si}{\PYGZob{}}\PYG{n+nb}{str}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n}{e}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{l+s+si}{\PYGZcb{}}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}
    \PYG{p}{)}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}


\subsection{Performance Monitoring}
\label{\detokenize{deployment:performance-monitoring}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
Track key metrics:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Add to trade.py}
\PYG{k}{def}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{n+nf}{log\PYGZus{}performance\PYGZus{}metrics}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n+nb+bp}{self}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{:}
\PYG{+w}{    }\PYG{l+s+sd}{\PYGZdq{}\PYGZdq{}\PYGZdq{}Log performance metrics periodically.\PYGZdq{}\PYGZdq{}\PYGZdq{}}
    \PYG{n}{summary} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{n+nb+bp}{self}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{get\PYGZus{}account\PYGZus{}summary}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{p}{)}

    \PYG{n+nb+bp}{self}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{logger}\PYG{o}{.}\PYG{n}{info}\PYG{p}{(}
        \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{Performance Metrics \PYGZhy{} }\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}
        \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{Total Trades: }\PYG{l+s+si}{\PYGZpc{}d}\PYG{l+s+s2}{, Win Rate: }\PYG{l+s+si}{\PYGZpc{}.2f}\PYG{l+s+si}{\PYGZpc{}\PYGZpc{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{, }\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}
        \PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{Total P\PYGZam{}L: \PYGZdl{}}\PYG{l+s+si}{\PYGZpc{}.2f}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{p}{,}
        \PYG{n}{summary}\PYG{p}{[}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{l+s+s1}{total\PYGZus{}trades}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{p}{]}\PYG{p}{,}
        \PYG{n}{summary}\PYG{p}{[}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{l+s+s1}{win\PYGZus{}rate}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{p}{]}\PYG{p}{,}
        \PYG{n}{summary}\PYG{p}{[}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{l+s+s1}{total\PYGZus{}pnl}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{p}{]}
    \PYG{p}{)}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}


\subsection{Scheduled Health Checks}
\label{\detokenize{deployment:scheduled-health-checks}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
Create health check script:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{c+ch}{\PYGZsh{}!/bin/bash}
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} health\PYGZus{}check.sh}

\PYG{n+nv}{LOG\PYGZus{}FILE}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}/var/log/woox\PYGZhy{}trading/trade.log\PYGZdq{}}

\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Check if bot is running}
\PYG{k}{if}\PYG{+w}{ }!\PYG{+w}{ }pgrep\PYG{+w}{ }\PYGZhy{}f\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}python trade.py\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYGZgt{}\PYG{+w}{ }/dev/null\PYG{p}{;}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{k}{then}
\PYG{+w}{    }\PYG{n+nb}{echo}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}Trading bot not running!\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{p}{|}\PYG{+w}{ }mail\PYG{+w}{ }\PYGZhy{}s\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}Bot Down Alert\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{+w}{ }your\PYGZhy{}email@example.com
\PYG{k}{fi}

\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Check for recent activity (within last 5 minutes)}
\PYG{k}{if}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{o}{[}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYGZhy{}f\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{n+nv}{\PYGZdl{}LOG\PYGZus{}FILE}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{o}{]}\PYG{p}{;}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{k}{then}
\PYG{+w}{    }\PYG{n+nv}{RECENT}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{k}{\PYGZdl{}(}find\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{n+nv}{\PYGZdl{}LOG\PYGZus{}FILE}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYGZhy{}mmin\PYG{+w}{ }\PYGZhy{}5\PYG{k}{)}
\PYG{+w}{    }\PYG{k}{if}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{o}{[}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYGZhy{}z\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{n+nv}{\PYGZdl{}RECENT}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{o}{]}\PYG{p}{;}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{k}{then}
\PYG{+w}{        }\PYG{n+nb}{echo}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}No recent log activity!\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{p}{|}\PYG{+w}{ }mail\PYG{+w}{ }\PYGZhy{}s\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}Bot Stalled Alert\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{+w}{ }your\PYGZhy{}email@example.com
\PYG{+w}{    }\PYG{k}{fi}
\PYG{k}{fi}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\sphinxAtStartPar
Add to crontab:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Run health check every 5 minutes}
*/5\PYG{+w}{ }*\PYG{+w}{ }*\PYG{+w}{ }*\PYG{+w}{ }*\PYG{+w}{ }/path/to/health\PYGZus{}check.sh
\end{sphinxVerbatim}


\section{Backup Strategy}
\label{\detokenize{deployment:backup-strategy}}

\subsection{Database Backups}
\label{\detokenize{deployment:database-backups}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
Automated daily backups:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{c+ch}{\PYGZsh{}!/bin/bash}
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} backup\PYGZus{}database.sh}

\PYG{n+nv}{BACKUP\PYGZus{}DIR}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}/path/to/backups\PYGZdq{}}
\PYG{n+nv}{DATE}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{k}{\PYGZdl{}(}date\PYG{+w}{ }+\PYGZpc{}Y\PYGZpc{}m\PYGZpc{}d\PYGZus{}\PYGZpc{}H\PYGZpc{}M\PYGZpc{}S\PYG{k}{)}

\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Backup live database}
cp\PYG{+w}{ }live\PYGZus{}transaction.db\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{n+nv}{\PYGZdl{}BACKUP\PYGZus{}DIR}\PYG{l+s+s2}{/live\PYGZus{}transaction\PYGZus{}}\PYG{n+nv}{\PYGZdl{}DATE}\PYG{l+s+s2}{.db}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}

\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Keep only last 30 days}
find\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{n+nv}{\PYGZdl{}BACKUP\PYGZus{}DIR}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYGZhy{}name\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}*.db\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYGZhy{}mtime\PYG{+w}{ }+30\PYG{+w}{ }\PYGZhy{}delete

\PYG{n+nb}{echo}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}\PYG{l+s+s2}{Backup completed: }\PYG{n+nv}{\PYGZdl{}DATE}\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\sphinxAtStartPar
Add to crontab:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Daily backup at 2 AM}
\PYG{l+m}{0}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{l+m}{2}\PYG{+w}{ }*\PYG{+w}{ }*\PYG{+w}{ }*\PYG{+w}{ }/path/to/backup\PYGZus{}database.sh
\end{sphinxVerbatim}


\subsection{Configuration Backups}
\label{\detokenize{deployment:configuration-backups}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
Version control your configuration:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
git\PYG{+w}{ }add\PYG{+w}{ }.config
git\PYG{+w}{ }commit\PYG{+w}{ }\PYGZhy{}m\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{l+s+s2}{\PYGZdq{}Update trading configuration\PYGZdq{}}
git\PYG{+w}{ }push
\end{sphinxVerbatim}


\section{Disaster Recovery}
\label{\detokenize{deployment:disaster-recovery}}

\subsection{Bot Crashes}
\label{\detokenize{deployment:bot-crashes}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
If using systemd, bot will auto\sphinxhyphen{}restart. Manual restart:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Systemd}
sudo\PYG{+w}{ }systemctl\PYG{+w}{ }restart\PYG{+w}{ }woox\PYGZhy{}trading

\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Screen}
screen\PYG{+w}{ }\PYGZhy{}r\PYG{+w}{ }trading\PYGZus{}bot
workon\PYG{+w}{ }woox
python\PYG{+w}{ }trade.py
\end{sphinxVerbatim}


\subsection{Database Corruption}
\label{\detokenize{deployment:database-corruption}}
\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Stop bot}
sudo\PYG{+w}{ }systemctl\PYG{+w}{ }stop\PYG{+w}{ }woox\PYGZhy{}trading

\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Restore from backup}
cp\PYG{+w}{ }/path/to/backup/live\PYGZus{}transaction\PYGZus{}YYYYMMDD.db\PYG{+w}{ }live\PYGZus{}transaction.db

\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Restart bot}
sudo\PYG{+w}{ }systemctl\PYG{+w}{ }start\PYG{+w}{ }woox\PYGZhy{}trading
\end{sphinxVerbatim}


\subsection{Lost Position}
\label{\detokenize{deployment:lost-position}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
Check database for position state:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
workon\PYG{+w}{ }woox
python\PYG{+w}{ }account.py\PYG{+w}{ }live
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\sphinxAtStartPar
Manually close if needed using WOOX web interface.


\section{Security Best Practices}
\label{\detokenize{deployment:security-best-practices}}

\subsection{API Key Security}
\label{\detokenize{deployment:api-key-security}}\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Use API keys with minimum required permissions (trading only)

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Enable IP whitelist on WOOX for API keys

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Rotate API keys periodically (every 90 days)

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Never commit API keys to version control

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Use environment variables for credentials

\end{itemize}


\subsection{Server Security}
\label{\detokenize{deployment:server-security}}\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Keep system updated: \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{sudo apt update \&\& sudo apt upgrade}}

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Enable firewall: \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{sudo ufw enable}}

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Use SSH keys instead of passwords

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Limit SSH access to specific IPs

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Regular security audits

\end{itemize}


\subsection{Code Security}
\label{\detokenize{deployment:code-security}}\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Keep dependencies updated: \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{pip list \sphinxhyphen{}\sphinxhyphen{}outdated}}

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Review code changes before deployment

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Use separate environments for dev/prod

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Implement rate limiting for API calls

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Validate all user inputs

\end{itemize}


\section{Scaling Considerations}
\label{\detokenize{deployment:scaling-considerations}}

\subsection{Multiple Symbols}
\label{\detokenize{deployment:multiple-symbols}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
For trading multiple pairs, run separate instances:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Instance 1: BTC}
\PYG{n+nv}{SYMBOL}\PYG{o}{=}SPOT\PYGZus{}BTC\PYGZus{}USDT\PYG{+w}{ }python\PYG{+w}{ }trade.py

\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Instance 2: ETH}
\PYG{n+nv}{SYMBOL}\PYG{o}{=}SPOT\PYGZus{}ETH\PYGZus{}USDT\PYG{+w}{ }python\PYG{+w}{ }trade.py
\end{sphinxVerbatim}


\subsection{Multiple Strategies}
\label{\detokenize{deployment:multiple-strategies}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
Run parallel strategies with different configs:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Conservative strategy}
cp\PYG{+w}{ }.config\PYG{+w}{ }.config.conservative
python\PYG{+w}{ }trade.py\PYG{+w}{  }\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Uses .config.conservative}

\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Aggressive strategy}
cp\PYG{+w}{ }.config\PYG{+w}{ }.config.aggressive
python\PYG{+w}{ }trade.py\PYG{+w}{  }\PYG{c+c1}{\PYGZsh{} Uses .config.aggressive}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}


\subsection{Performance Tuning}
\label{\detokenize{deployment:performance-tuning}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
For high\sphinxhyphen{}frequency trading:
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Reduce UPDATE\_INTERVAL\_SECONDS

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Use PERP instead of SPOT (better liquidity)

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Optimize database writes (batch inserts)

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Monitor API rate limits

\end{itemize}


\section{Troubleshooting Production Issues}
\label{\detokenize{deployment:troubleshooting-production-issues}}

\subsection{High CPU Usage}
\label{\detokenize{deployment:high-cpu-usage}}\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Increase UPDATE\_INTERVAL\_SECONDS

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Check for infinite loops in logs

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Reduce orderbook depth (30 \(\rightarrow\) 10 levels)

\end{itemize}


\subsection{Memory Leaks}
\label{\detokenize{deployment:memory-leaks}}\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Check deque size (should be limited to 1440)

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Monitor with: \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{ps aux | grep python}}

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Restart bot daily as workaround

\end{itemize}


\subsection{API Rate Limits}
\label{\detokenize{deployment:api-rate-limits}}\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Increase delays between requests

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Cache orderbook data

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Use WebSocket for real\sphinxhyphen{}time data (future enhancement)

\end{itemize}

\sphinxAtStartPar
After successful deployment:
\begin{enumerate}

\chapter{Overview}
\label{\detokenize{index:overview}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
The WOOX Trading Bot is a Python\sphinxhyphen{}based automated trading system that:
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Monitors BTC\_USDT market in real\sphinxhyphen{}time

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Implements multiple trading strategies (MA Crossover, RSI, Bollinger Bands)

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Supports both paper and live trading modes

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Records all transactions in DuckDB database

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Provides comprehensive account management

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Includes deep orderbook analysis (100 levels)

\end{itemize}


\chapter{Features}
\label{\detokenize{index:features}}\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Real\sphinxhyphen{}time Market Data}: Fetches latest price, volume, and orderbook data

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Multiple Strategies}: Choose from MA Crossover, RSI, or Bollinger Bands

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Risk Management}: Built\sphinxhyphen{}in stop\sphinxhyphen{}loss and take\sphinxhyphen{}profit mechanisms

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Paper Trading}: Test strategies without risking real money

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Transaction Database}: Complete trade history in DuckDB

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Portfolio Analysis}: Jupyter notebook for performance tracking

\end{itemize}


\chapter{Quick Start}
\label{\detokenize{index:quick-start}}\begin{enumerate}
\sphinxsetlistlabels{\arabic}{enumi}{enumii}{}{.}%
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Install dependencies:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
pip\PYG{+w}{ }install\PYG{+w}{ }\PYGZhy{}r\PYG{+w}{ }requirements.txt
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Set up API credentials in \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{.zshrc}}:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{n+nb}{export}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{n+nv}{WOOX\PYGZus{}API\PYGZus{}KEY}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}your\PYGZus{}api\PYGZus{}key\PYGZsq{}}
\PYG{n+nb}{export}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{n+nv}{WOOX\PYGZus{}API\PYGZus{}SECRET}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}your\PYGZus{}api\PYGZus{}secret\PYGZsq{}}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Configure trading parameters in \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{.config}} file

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Start paper trading:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
python\PYG{+w}{ }trade.py
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\end{enumerate}
